BlackCat.NAME: Black Cat
DESCRIPTIONS: Shuffle a random Curse in your deck at the beginning of each fight. Gain [B] whenever you draw a Curse.

PetCage.NAME: Pet Cage
DESCRIPTIONS: Add a random Familiar in your hand at the beginning of each turn.

WalkingCane.NAME: Walking Cane
DESCRIPTIONS: Weak, Vulnerable and Decrepit no longer decrease each turn.

Scissors.NAME: Scissors
Scissors.FLAVOUR: Let's take just a couple inches off...
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you add a rare card to your deck, remove a random Strike or Defend.
